Mamalia marin mungkin porpoise tanpa sirip
\n The marine mammal is probably finless porpoise
Mamalia marin mungkin lumba-lumba irrawady
\n The marine mammal is probably irrawady dolphin
Mamalia marin mungkin lumba-lumba bottlenose
\n The marine mammal is probably bottlenose dolphin
Mamalia marin mungkin lumba-lumba humpback
\n The marine mammal is probably indo pacific humpback dolphin

Pengenalan \n Sila ambil gambar marin mamalia yang dijumpai dan ikut arahan yang diberikan di dalam aplikasi mamalia marin ini. Dengan aplikasi ini, anda boleh mengambil sebarang gambar mamalia marin, menentukan samada ia mati atau hidup dan mengenal pasti jenis spesies. Anda akan menyumbang kepada data program pemantauan mamalia marin yang sedang berjalan di Pulau Pinang, di mana ia sangat penting untuk memperoleh maklumat mengenai kesebaran mamalia marin serta ketumpatan bilangan mereka. Terima kasih.

Introduction Statement \n Please take a picture of the marine mammal and follow the instructions in this marine mammal app. It allows you to take a picture of a marine mammal, determine if it is dead or alive and identify its species. You will contribute to an on-going monitoring programme for marine mammals in Penang which is very important for learning about their distribution and density. Thank you
